website_summaries.verdict: While these B12 gummies contain some ingredients that won't appeal to everyone, they are worth considering for anyone who wants a great-tasting, easy-to-take option.
pros: Stands out for the cherry flavor and gummy consistency that's almost like eating candy instead of taking supplements
Doesn't contain corn syrup or gluten
cons: Each dose (2 gummies) contains 3 gm of sugar
Not vegetarian – contains gelatin and beeswax
Caution must be taken around children who may think they are candy

customer_reviews.title: Best B-12
customer_reviews.text: These are the best B-12 vitamins I have ever tasted as well as the most potent. I am anemic and very deficient in B-12 and these gummies give me life! I take more than the recommended dosage and it gives me energy. I take three in the morning and three in the evening. I find that when I take three right before bed I wake up feeling a little bit more refreshed. I have tried many different B-12 vitamins and this one is by far the one I have had the best, most pleasant experience with!
customer_reviews.author: Gie

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: I felt the difference the first day more energy with zero side effects I have severe anxiety and panic attacks so I feel every little weird thing that happens with anything I take I take these with my omegas and vitamin D3 and I am good to go will purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Bubba

customer_reviews.title: Great brand, great flavor, excellent results!
customer_reviews.text: I struggle with chronic fatigue, and I take this supplement each morning boost my energy levels before I walk out the door. After taking this supplement consistently, I feel so much more energized in the morning. It’s great! They taste really good. I don’t taste any artificial-tasting flavors or sweeteners. I’ve reordered this product more times than I can count, and I know that it will be part of my vitamin regimen for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, but WRONG B12!
customer_reviews.text: I recommend the seller, and the taste of these gummies are simply addictive, BUT this is not the correct supplement. If you want to take B12, you need to look for methylcoblamin. This variation does not offer the nutritional benefifs that you're looking for; it is a cheap substitute. I hope they make this change, cause the flavor is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Great gummies, really effective.
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended that I take a B12 supplement so I chose these. They taste like cherry gummy candies so they're very pleasant. They work very well. At my most recent health checkup, my blood work no longer showed a B12 deficiency, so these gummies have done their job. They are easy to store and even in the heat (I live in hot, humid, Texas) they don't melt or stick together in the package.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: This product didn't give me energy but I did experience heart palpitations. I noted from another customer here on Amazon that this product is not made from the natural form of Vitamin B12 (methylcobalamin) but instead it is manufactured from a synthetic cheaper form of Vitamin B12 (cyanocobalamin). I am truly disappointed because I entrusted that Vitafusion was a reputable company with better natural standards.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L.

customer_reviews.title: Normally they are fine, received a bad bottle.
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying these for some time. The last bottle I received are all stuck together and off colored. I was going to send them back. To much trouble, hope my next bottle will be better. They may have been stored in a warm place.
customer_reviews.author: Money Mike

customer_reviews.title: Uses cyanocobalamin B12 instead of methylcobalamin B12
customer_reviews.text: I bought a B12 supplement due to my vegetarian diet. I’ve taken them for a week and have felt no difference in my energy level and then I learned this is made with the cyanocobalamin version of B12 ( it offers the most stable form of B-12, although it does so through the presence of a cyanide molecule) instead of the methylcobalamin which is the most active form in the human body. So I’ll be searching for a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jessalyn

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: I typically love Vitafusion Products. However I can tell that there was ABSOLUTELY a packaging /storing issue with this product & another Vitafusion gummy which I bought together. Both were dried out & old seemingly. Taste was even "off" & tasted like the cardboard packaging it came in which I thought was grossly odd! Better off paying the extra dollar or two & buy it in store! Trust me! Don't make my mistake. (Vitafusion Company - Take note to look into the properly temp & storage of your products with Amazon, there is an issue here).
customer_reviews.author: Archie Bunker

customer_reviews.title: Good deal!
customer_reviews.text: Considering the serving size is two gummies, this means the bottle lasts for about 45 days which I think is extremely reasonable considering the low price. I have only been taking these for about three weeks, but I still have seen a slight improvement and have not experienced any side effects or anything that would cause me to stop taking them.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: B12 yummy
customer_reviews.text: The best B12 rather than buying on a shelf at walgreens.... Thanks amazon
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Taste great! My only concern about taking gummies is the ...
customer_reviews.text: Taste great! My only concern about taking gummies is the carbs, however I find them easier to take than pills and I actually look forward to taking them, thus resulting in me ACTUALLY taking my vitamins on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: jw

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have a severe B12 deficiency and anemia, and these have helped so much. They taste great, are easy to take, and give me so much energy! Was a little concerned when they arrived in a refrigerated box that had completely melted in the FL sun, so I keep them in the fridge though it doesn’t say it’s necessary. Either way, it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These gummies include pork skin. Not vegetarian/vegan & not for those who do not consume pork.
customer_reviews.author: Lucine Malekian

customer_reviews.title: I like these!
customer_reviews.text: I've read some reviews that people don't think these taste good, but as far as I'm concerned, they taste fine--like cherries. They're a little tart, but so are cherries after all. I can tell a positive difference in my energy level since I've started them and as soon as I finish this review I am going to order more.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Buy from the Store... Beware Gummy Raisins
customer_reviews.text: When gummies arrived they were shriveled up as if they were left exposed to heat. I still had a few B12 gummies left over from the bottle I got from the store (same brand, count, product etc.) and compared side by side and it was like the moisture removed and resembled a miniature withered version.... decided to toss these (don’t want to take a chance) and bought another bottle from the store so I could see them first. Not a great experience - but I take responsibility for buying a perishable good online.
customer_reviews.author: michalaroo

customer_reviews.title: Great product, disgusting taste
customer_reviews.text: I love the Vitafusion brand and take the women’s multi gummy everyday. Those are absolutely delicious and I have to make sure I don’t have more than 2 every morning. But these? These taste awful. They taste like cherry flavored tussin. I don’t know what the options are right now for returning packages during the shutdowns, but I don’t know if I can get through a whole bottle of these :/
customer_reviews.author: Shelbs

customer_reviews.title: 0 ENERGY, Don't waste your time
customer_reviews.text: This does not give any energy at all. Waste of my money

customer_reviews.title: What happened to Vitafusions B complex dummies
customer_reviews.text: I bought these thinking they were B Complex which I have bought from Vitafusion in the past. It seems they are no longer making the plain B complex. I returned these as I didn't want just Vitamin B12. If they bring back the B complex they used to sell, I'll be buying them again. Vitafusions gummy vitamins make it such an easy way to take vitamins, I'm sold.
customer_reviews.author: goldenlvrTop Contributor: Quilting

customer_reviews.title: One Star

customer_reviews.text: Take daily. Have noticed zero difference. My energy is just as horrible as when I started taking this.

customer_reviews.title: Good product, weird packaging
customer_reviews.text: These are great but the bottle showed up looking like it had been through the wringer - the seal was intact but the label had been put on all wrong. I was tempted to return it but it didn't seem worth the time since the seal was okay. I've been eating them and I'm still alive so I guess it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Cherelle G.

customer_reviews.title: love these - subscribed!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite, I've been trying different kinds of B12's this year and I've settled on these. They're really good, and I think they work, and I think they're worth the money and you get a lot of them and I got them on subscribe and save! great deal! Still using them on subscribe and save!

customer_reviews.title: Love these gummies!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these gummies. They have a great taste, tastes lile candy, easy to chew and swallow. I hate the typical horse size pill vitamins that makes me feel like choking amd get stuck in my chest. These are perfect and a must have. Will definitely be ordering again.

customer_reviews.title: Really tasty, seem to have the intended effect.
customer_reviews.text: It's very mellow, but I can feel a slight background buzz when these kick in. I take one with each meal and have noticed a small improvement in my energy levels, which has led me to buy 3 bottles so far. These also have a really delicious cherry flavor that resembles Luden's cough drops.

customer_reviews.author: Avidshopper

customer_reviews.title: Another great Vitafusion product.
customer_reviews.text: All of the vitamins I take are gummies. This is my favorite brand. They taste great and since I began taking them on a daily basis, I feel better and my yearly blood work is normal. In the past, I have registered deficiencies in D and B, and that no longer happens.

customer_reviews.title: Chewable Gummies
customer_reviews.text: These taste good, I think they are cherry. Easy to chew and easy for me to get some B12 in me! I tend to use gummies for several of my vitamins. This time I went with the extra strength 3000mcg dose, which are 2 gummies, per day. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: N. C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product! 👍
customer_reviews.text: Love love these, even my overall energy level is better when taking these! Whenever I forget or stop for a day or two, I notice that I'm sluggish and but feeling quite good...SoI get right back to taking these immediately! So glad I found these!!!👍

customer_reviews.title: Easy on the stomach
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended I take B vitamins. I researched brands and read reviews. I have a picky digestive system and can’t take most vitamins. I’ve ordered this brand and intend to keep on doing so! Great game taste and doesn’t upset my stomach. Highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Great vitamins just buy and try great taste
customer_reviews.text: My sister had told me about this vitamin so I went a head to search on Amazon low and behold i saw it i guessThere is nothing you cannot find it on Amazon I went ahead and bought it the price was reasonable so it very great my nails grew It gave me energy very good buy I would recommend this to everyone

customer_reviews.title: Take your vitamins

customer_reviews.title: So tasty

I highly recommend and have bought this several times!

customer_reviews.title: Maybe not the best energy boost, but better than ingesting more caffeine.
customer_reviews.text: I am feeling a slight increase in my energy level after having used it for about 14 days. I expected a better energy boost... butI figure it might be due to a very busy toddler running my life and middle age... go figure.

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins are delicious. I definitely noticed increased energy. I was hoping a metabolism boost would help me lose weight, but that hasn't happened. I also noticed that they are 125,000% of your suggested daily value of B12, which is insane. I hope they are safe.

customer_reviews.title: Great health gummy, plus treat.
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking gummies for a while now, I can’t swallow pills very well, I always take them about 9PM, when I am wanting a treat before bed, I have lost 8 pounds so far, by just using gummies for my health, and for my treat. They taste great, chew them slowly.

customer_reviews.title: They taste delicious.

customer_reviews.title: Good taste and effective.

customer_reviews.title: Great taste!

I can’t say if my energy has increased, but I certainly feel like my metabolism has increased, so I consider that a win. I will buy this again.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend

customer_reviews.text: Being a vegetarian, I am always low on B vitamins and I have discovered that I just won't take pills. These gummies are very yummy and I find I take them regularly
customer_reviews.author: Amanda V Butler

product_meta.title: Vitafusion Extra Strength Vitamin B12 Gummies, 90 Count (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description: vitafusion Extra Strength Vitamin B12 fuses delicious and nutritious. Two Extra Strength B12 gummies provide 3000 mcg - 125000% daily value - of B12. Vitamin Better! At vitafusion, we believe taste and nutrition can be fused together to deliver the best vitamin experience, ensuring it’s an easy and delicious part of your day. For over 12 years, we’ve been helping people to live happy and healthy lives with our gummy vitamins and supplements. Anything is possible when great nutrition is your foundation. Take a fruitful step toward a healthier, happier world with America’s #1 gummy vitamin brand. Vitamin Better! [1] These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.
feature_bullets: Helps support energy metabolism and nervous system health, essential for red blood cell formation[1]
Contains NO high-fructose corn syrup, NO artificial sweeteners, NO gluten, NO dairy and NO synthetic (FD&C) dyes
Recipient of the 2018 ChefsBest Excellence Award. The ChefsBest Excellence Award is awarded to brands that surpass quality standards established by independent professional chefs.
